column4: I just got my ASUS U31F. After installing ubuntu 10.10 ( perfectminimal ) I notice that I have no wireless, and the wireless LED is on. Any suggestions on what to do?
just log out and back in again. (no need to reboot)
Wicd - Wired and Wireless Network Connection Manager

wicd is not a command, it is a service that is run all the time.  A little icon will appear in the bar that looks like one monitor behind another.  You click on the icon in order to view  or connect to a network.
what "gnome gui question for admin password"?
What OS do you have installed on your computer?
Have you added new users to your system?
Have you added any new users to your system?
Well, I dono... just use it from CLI I guess.
